ComicInfo.Summary: While chasing the Pez killer, Jake has been shot and is in critical condition as Sara rides with him to the hospital. Sara makes a deal with the Witchblade to save Jake's life and reveal the identity of the Pez killer--fellow officer John Kelly who has been possessed by an ancient demon.
ComicInfo.Tags: New York City,Sara Pezzini,New York State,Jake McCarthy,Witchblade,Joe Siry,John Kelly,New York Police Department
